title: Pulsefire ezreal Icon
body:
Hello,
I own the pulsefire ezreal skin since the release .. Yet i didn't get the new icon .. And I've restarted the client many times and scrolled down but 
didn't get it ..

Summoner name : RéanimateÐ Ýasuõ

replies.body: We've pretty much wrapped up distributing PFE icons, but it's weird you haven't received yours yet.  I've verified your account, and have added the icon!  Thanks for waiting!
